Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Membro dell’Editoral Executive Panel della Rivista Internazionale Statistical Methods & Applications SMA - Springer (2004-2013) ISSN: 1618-2510 (Print) 1613-981X (Online)

Attività di Revisore per le riviste Computational Statistics and Data Analysis, Annals of Operations Research, Journal of Classification, Statistical Papers, Information Sciences, Advances in Data Analysis and Classification, Statistics Education Research Journal, Journal of Computation and Simulation, Statistical Methods and Applications, Journal of the Royal Stat. Soc. C., Psychometrika, Communication in Statistics, Collana "Studies in Classification, Data Analysis and Knowledge Organization” Series by Springer
Reviewer della collana di Statistica della Springer “Studies in Theoretical and Applied Statistics”

CO-EDITOR del volume "Analysis and Modeling of Complex Data in Behavioural and Social Sciences " (D. Vicari, A. Okada, G. Ragozini, C. Weihs Eds.) nella COLLANA INTERNAZIONALE “Studies in Classification, Data Analysis, and Knowledge Organization” (ISSN 1431-8814), Springer, (ISBN 978-3-319-06691-2)
Membro dell’Editoral Board in qualità di Associate Editor della Rivista Internazionale Behaviormetrika - Springer (dal 2016) ISSN: 0385-7417 (print version) ISSN: 1349-6964 (electronic version)
